pages.text: This is a badger. They are know for their long claws and red eyes. And yes, they are dangerous. Badger are one of the greatest threats for cats.$(br)

pages.title: About the Squirrel
pages.text: Badgers can be found in biomes such as forests and plains. $(br2)Badgers tend to wander around and kill any cat. They are not too fast but their long sharp claws could tear any cat apart in an instant. $(br2)This is a fox-hearted animal you really want to avoid. Even an experienced warrior could find it difficult to drive one of these away.$(br)
